1.text: Fill a large pot with warm water and place it on the stove.

2.text: Remove the water from the burner once it starts boiling.

3.text: Let the water cool until the temperature drops below 140 °F (60 °C).

4.text: Place the open honey container into the warm water.

5.text: Wait at least 30 minutes for the honey to soften.

6.text: Take the lid off the jar before heating the honey.

7.text: Set your microwave to a lower power setting.

8.text: Heat the jar in the microwave for 30 to 60 seconds.
